description: When comparing Flowblade to Pitivi, I've found It to be roughly as powerful, while being less crash prone.
I discovered this application and it seems really great! I suggest you to give it a try.
A very mediocre attempt to make an ffmpeg frontend. Why do people make this sort of cr.p when they don't know how to?
summary: Does NOT work. I really tried

description: needs a 1152 X 768 screen size minimum
Perhaps I have a slow computer, but when I try to start Flowblade, a background process starts. It doesn't use any CPU, but it also doesn't show a window or anything... (On Ubuntu 18.04)
Well, I searched for free linux video editer and this was the first result. I wonder why -_-
This piece of garbage is horrendous. When it doesn't crash every 5 minutes, it's just impossible to use.

Yes, it does crash sometimes when OVERLOADED with input, but I've used this piece of software for ALL of my YouTube video creations (over 100 now!) and it works like Ableton, for video creators. Thank you, Flowblade folks!
Works fine on my antique Thinkpad with 18.04.  I found a good tutorial on youtube to get started.

I don't know what all the complaining is about. I use it all of the time and it works great. Crashes sometimes but it always saves the crash after reopening. Good editing tool for music as well as video/music creation. 

Those that can, usually do. The rest are critics.
It only rendered 1:05 of 6:24 videos. I can't change mpg to mp4. I'm disappointed.
works better then more other app
A lot of people are saying that it won't start, but I believe it is because Ubuntu is using python3 to run flowblade instead of python2. I checked this using terminal.
I tried using it, but after an hour gave up as it wouldnt let me cut the left portion of the video. kept cutting off everything to the right of the selected point.
I have a more than capable machine. Crashes every time on basic functions. Can't even import a video clip to begin to edit.
I would encourage that Ubuntu updates to the latest version of it so to fix some bugs that happen at rendering

The bar should rightfully be low for free software but this is just a sad attempt at a front end. It's like the developer has never used any other video editing software in their life. I didn't pay any money for this but I still feel scammed out of my time. You could learn Qt off of stack overflow in the same time it takes to google how to do anything with this app. Download this if you want to be late in delivering whatever you're working on.
summary: A masterclass on how not to build a UI

description: It does not even launch

like i have tried kdenlive , i used kdenlive for 2 months but still it is a little complicated for me . but flowblade is really easy .easy to controll , easy to edited , good modern design , its like a god in editing history . i am a new commer in editing thing so yeah , its good for any new commer
summary: this app makes editing really easy

description: THis app is OK if you want a fast preview movie, but it lacks alot of functionality such as volume level control and fade. I dont get how the filters are supposed to be applied, some of them dont have controls they ought such as the volume filter and the pan-by-key frame filter have no controls. Moving and cutting tracks is clunky due to the snap forcing tracks together. I want to give it 3 stars but due to missing volume fades can only give 2.5
summary: Average - Frequent Crash and No volume transitions eg audio fade

description: Always crashes, hasn't worked for me once

never crashes ! 
fast and good 
but export audio without video is wanted
Sehr gutes Videoschnittprogramm. Eine klasse Alternative zu Kdenlive und Co.
Man kann SD Videos und HD Videos schneiden Klasse.
Es passiert 0 komma nix.
summary: Die Anwendung lässt sich nicht einmal öffnen

description: Crash direkt nach dem Start
Es un proyecto que se ve interesante sobre todo para hacer ediciones de vídeos no muy avanzadas ya que es fácil de entender su manejo.
La edición es rápida con proyectos que no requieren de tantos efectos.
Logiciel vite virer !
Хороший редактор. Со своей задачей справляется.
Грузит проц при открытии.
